textSub.name: para1
textSub.string:
You've reached the den of the deadly Shark King! Can
 you defeat him and take his place at the very top of the
 food chain? Be careful, because food is scarce in here.
 The King doesn't leave much uneaten.

textSub.name: para2
textSub.string:
HINT:
 Use Shield bubbles and Jelly Fish to protect you against
 the Shark King's charges. This is it... Good Luck!
